Description: Featuring a plunging halter top and an open back, this empire waisted gown is posh and full of sparkle.  Crystal beading bodice extends down to the skirt for a flattering look. The waist line is also accented with an intricate design of crystal bead work. This floor length slightly flare skirt with train is sure to please.
